subject: April 2024 Simsonn Pro pedals - control box issue
description_text:
Hi,

I have Simsonn Pro pedals I purchased in April 2024. The pedals are no
longer recognized by my PC. When I plug the pedal control box back in to
the PC, an orange light briefly flashes 4 times.

Should I replace my control box? If so, which Simsonn control box is
compatible with my pedals?

Thank you
